comments.body: I am not sure how to go about checking this patch using Mercurial. Assuming my clone is up to date, how do I temporarily apply this patch and then rollback afterwards?

comments.body: The simplest is to make another local copy of your server side clone and then pull the change from viewcp32's clone into this new local copy.

comments.body:
I was unable to test since alot of UI changes have been applied since this patch was created and consequently there are numerous and multiple merge conflicts. The author should reapply and resubmit the changes against the latest build. 

Regarding the actual feature, I made comment in the original forum thread but since it is optional via a new setting, "Display pointing card", then I don't see any reason why it should be not be accepted.

**Status:** Done
